price: Yo soy Al-lah, y no hay más divinidad que Yo. Adórame solo a Mí y haz la oración para recordarme.
arabic: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innanī anā al-lahu lā ilāha illā anā fa-uʿ'bud'nī wa-aqimi al-ṣalata lidhik'rī
